snippet: China’s February drop in exports and a production setback for Boeing were offset by healthy jumps for Facebook and Alexion Pharmaceuticals.
abstract: Stock market drifts lower, weighed down by soft data out of China and Boeing's latest production setback.
lead_paragraph: China’s February drop in exports and a production setback for Boeing were offset by healthy jumps for Facebook and Alexion Pharmaceuticals.

headline.main: Market Slips as China’s Exports Take a Spill
